data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Create baseline availability and lead-time rules representing the UC default business hours and booking window behavior.
data.expectedResult: Availability defaults and rules are stored and can be referenced by calendars.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

resultPayload.note: Advanced split-tender flow executed and traceable through intent/tender/line allocations.

data.instruction: Execute advanced payment path (split tender and/or tip/gift/credit entitlement usage) and persist allocation evidence.
data.expectedResult: Payment trace clearly links payer, tender mix, and booking/order amounts with no ambiguity.

resultPayload.note: Advanced split-tender flow executed and traceable through intent/tender/line allocations.
